DOC.brief_summary: This study determine ZOSTAVAX™ safe , tolerable , immunogenic healthy adult India .
DOC.brief_title: Safety , Tolerability , Immunogenicity Zoster Vaccine Live ( ZOSTAVAX™ ) Healthy Adults India ( V211-025 )
DOC.criteria: No fever day vaccination Females negative pregnancy test use acceptable method birth control , postmenopausal Underlying chronic illness must stable History hypersensitivity reaction vaccine component Prior receipt varicella zoster vaccine Prior history herpes zoster Have recently another vaccination Have recently receive blood product autologous blood transfusion Pregnant breast feeding Use immunosuppressive therapy Known suspect immune dysfunction Use nontopical antiviral therapy activity herpesvirus
